info.name: Twitter Custom Moko UI — iSlash Version FIXED 2018
info.description: ✔ This style is based on Custom Moko's Twitter Theme I've fixed a few issues and tailored it to my own liking. All credits goes to: TheSound changelog: fixed few minor UI issues UN-Hide timeline tweet box. Hide Clutters: Promoted Tweets - Advertised with Twitter - footers - & etc. Option to change Twitter default font : Choose from 6 different fontsThe Optimized for RTL Languages: Persian (Farsi) Arabic Urdu فونت توییتر فارسی عربي
info.additionalInfo: If something that's messed up send me a tweet or direct msg @s3micolon استایل توییتر با امکانت انتخاب بین ۶ فونت فارسی: - Sahel ساحل - Parastoo پرستو - Vazir وزیر - Shabnam شبنم - Samim صمیم - Droid Noto Naskh نوتو نسخ
